Package com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.progression

This package is for progression of the Game over time and actions.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Phase
    A phase that knows about what is occurring during it, how to keep track of territories, and what kinds of territories it wants to keep track of.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPhase
    A Phase that can keep track of Territories to process at a given limit that is controlled by a specific Player.
    AttackPhase
    A Phase that takes a defending territory and defending territory, uses Territories' properties to change the ownership of those Territories.
    EffectPhase
    An effect phase.
    ReinforcePhase
    A Phase that is meant to add value to Territories incrementally.
    Round
    A Round is made up of multiple players that each get Turns within this Round.
    Turn
    A Turn is taken by one Player and made up of Phases.

Package com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.progression Description

This package is for progression of the Game over time and actions. Rounds, Turns, and Phases are all a part of this.
